enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Pre-requisite: Students must have taken, be currently enrolled, or concurrently registered for RTVF 190 for the upcoming quarter.
Add Consent: Department Consent Required
title: SoC RTVF 379-0-20 Topics in Film/Video/Audio Production
topic: Making the Short Project that Connects

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course is by invitation only for students who have received Media Arts Grants through RTVF. Students will develop, shoot, and edit their grant projects during the quarter

subject: RTVF
